item.title: The Lenovo Go S Is $120 Off
item.description: The upgraded version of the Legion Go S with SteamOS makes for a nice Steam Deck upgrade.

item.title: Bad Bunny Has MAGA All Worked Up
item.description: After avoiding the continental US on his world tour due to ICE, Bad Bunny’s Super Bowl halftime show will be a battleground for the country’s culture ...

item.title: China Is Leading the World in the Clean Energy Transition. Here's What That Looks Like
item.description: The country spends like no one else on renewables and has reshaped the global market. Is it enough?

item.title: Your Delivery Robot Is Here
item.description: On this episode of Uncanny Valley, we introduce you to DoorDash’s new delivery robot and discuss what the growing robot population means for humans.

item.title: Sam Altman Says the GPT-5 Haters Got It All Wrong
item.description: OpenAI's CEO explains that its large language model has been misunderstood—and that he's changed his attitude to AGI.
